column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Great place. Definitely worth a visit. I've been 30+ times and still find new things every time. So good
column2: even your snooty European friends will be impressed. And don't forget
column3: your ticket is good all day and for re-entry
column4: so go early and when you're tired of standing
column5: grab lunch for a couple hours and come back. Great time
